body_html:
Bumping the minimum required version to the cutting edge version has caused many issues before.
Due to this, I am against this change in minimum requirement until at least bazel 0.19 is out.

Bumping the minimum required version to the cutting edge version has caused many issues before.
Due to this, I am against this change in minimum requirement until at least bazel 0.19 is out.
body:
Bumping the minimum required version to the cutting edge version has caused many issues before.
Due to this, I am against this change in minimum requirement until at least bazel 0.19 is out.
